00016 //---------------------------------
00017 // Dynamic array of owned pointers. 
00018 // Ownership transfer semantics.
00019 //---------------------------------
00020 
00021 template <class T> 
00022 class auto_vector
00023 {
00024 public:
00025         class auto_lvalue
00026         {
00027         public:
00028                 auto_lvalue (T * & p) : _p (p) {}
00029                 operator T * () const { return _p; }
00030                 T * operator-> () const { return _p; }
00031                 auto_lvalue & operator= (std::auto_ptr<T> ap)
00032                 {
00033                         delete _p;
00034                         _p = ap.release ();
00035                         return *this;
00036                 }
00037         private:
00038                 T * & _p;
00039         };
00040 public:
00041 
00042     explicit auto_vector (size_t capacity = 0);
00043     ~auto_vector ();
00044 
00045         // memory management
00046     size_t  size () const { return _arr.size (); }
00047         size_t  capacity () const { return _arr.capacity (); }
00048     void reserve (size_t count);
00049         void resize (unsigned int newSize);
00050         void erase (size_t idx);
00051     void clear ();
00052         void compact ();
00053         void swap (auto_vector<T> & other)
00054         {
00055                 _arr.swap (other._arr);
00056         }
00057         // array access
00058     T const * operator [] (size_t i) const { return _arr [i]; }
00059         auto_lvalue operator [] (size_t i) 
00060         { 
00061                 return auto_lvalue (_arr [i]); 
00062         }
00063         void assign (size_t i, std::auto_ptr<T> p);
00064         void assign_direct (size_t i, T * p);
00065         void insert (size_t idx, std::auto_ptr<T> p);
00066         // stack access
00067         void push_back (std::auto_ptr<T> p);
00068         std::auto_ptr<T> pop_back (); // non-standard
00069         T * back () { return _arr.back (); }
00070     T const * back () const { return _arr.back (); }
00071         T * front () { return _arr.front (); }
00072     T const * front () const { return _arr.front (); }
00073         // iterators
00074         typedef typename std::vector<T*>::iterator                              iterator;
00075         typedef typename std::vector<T*>::const_iterator                const_iterator;
00076         typedef typename std::vector<T*>::reverse_iterator              reverse_iterator;
00077         typedef typename std::vector<T*>::const_reverse_iterator const_reverse_iterator;
00078 
00079 
00080         iterator                                begin () { return _arr.begin (); }
00081         iterator                                end () { return _arr.end (); }
00082         const_iterator                  begin () const { return _arr.begin (); }
00083         const_iterator                  end () const { return _arr.end (); }
00084         reverse_iterator                rbegin() { return _arr.rbegin (); }
00085         reverse_iterator                rend()   { return _arr.rend (); }
00086         const_reverse_iterator  rbegin() const  { return _arr.rbegin (); }
00087         const_reverse_iterator  rend() const    { return _arr.rend (); }
00088 
00089         iterator erase (iterator it);
00090 
00091         // iterator/index conversion
00092         size_t ToIndex (iterator const & it);
00093         size_t ToIndex (reverse_iterator const & rit); 
00094         iterator ToIter (size_t idx);
00095         reverse_iterator ToRIter (size_t idx);
00096 private:
00097         auto_vector (auto_vector<T> const & src);
00098         auto_vector<T> & operator= (auto_vector<T> const & src);
00099 private:
00100         std::vector<T*>         _arr;
00101 };

00103 template <class T>
00104 auto_vector<T>::auto_vector (size_t capacity)
00105 {
00106         _arr.reserve (capacity);
00107 }
00108 
00109 template <class T>
00110 auto_vector<T>::~auto_vector ()
00111 {
00112         clear ();
00113 }

00115 template <class T>
00116 void auto_vector<T>::push_back (std::auto_ptr<T> ptr)
00117 {
00118     _arr.push_back (ptr.get ());
00119     ptr.release ();
00120 }

00122 template <class T>
00123 inline std::auto_ptr<T> auto_vector<T>::pop_back () 
00124 {
00125         assert (size () != 0);
00126         T * p = _arr.back ();
00127         _arr.pop_back ();
00128         return std::auto_ptr<T> (p);
00129 }
00130 
00131 template <class T>
00132 class DeletePtr
00133 {
00134 public:
00135         void operator () (T * p)
00136         {
00137                 delete p;
00138         }
00139 };
00140 
00141 template <class T>
00142 void auto_vector<T>::clear ()
00143 {
00144         std::for_each (begin (), end (), DeletePtr<T> ());
00145         _arr.clear ();
00146 }
00147 
00148 template <class T>
00149 inline void auto_vector<T>::assign_direct (size_t i, T * p)
00150 {
00151     assert (i < size ());
00152         if (_arr [i] != p)
00153                 delete _arr [i];
00154         _arr [i] = p;
00155 }
00156 
00157 template <class T>
00158 inline void auto_vector<T>::assign (size_t i, std::auto_ptr<T> p)
00159 {
00160     assert (i < size ());
00161         if (_arr [i] != p.get ())
00162                 delete _arr [i];
00163         _arr [i] = p.release ();
00164 }
00165 
00166 template <class T>
00167 void auto_vector<T>::erase (size_t idx)
00168 {
00169     assert (idx < size ());
00170         // Delete item
00171         delete _arr [idx];
00172         // Compact array
00173         _arr.erase (ToIter (idx));
00174 }
00175 
00176 template <class T>
00177 typename auto_vector<T>::iterator auto_vector<T>::erase (typename auto_vector<T>::iterator it)
00178 {
00179     assert (it < end ());
00180         delete *it;
00181         return _arr.erase (it);
00182 }
00183 
00184 template <class T>
00185 void auto_vector<T>::compact ()
00186 {
00187         // move null pointers to the end
00188         T * null = 0;
00189         iterator pos = std::remove (begin (), end (), null);
00190         _arr.resize (pos - begin ());
00191 }

00193 template <class T>
00194 size_t auto_vector<T>::ToIndex (iterator const & it)  
00195 {
00196         assert (it - begin () >= 0);
00197         return static_cast<size_t> (it - begin ());
00198 }
00199 
00200 template <class T>
00201 size_t auto_vector<T>::ToIndex (reverse_iterator const & rit)  
00202 {
00203         iterator it = rit.base ();
00204         --it;
00205         assert (it - begin () >= 0);
00206         return static_cast<size_t> (it - begin ());
00207 }
00208 
00209 template <class T>
00210 typename auto_vector<T>::iterator auto_vector<T>::ToIter (size_t idx) 
00211 { 
00212         return begin () + idx;
00213 }
00214 
00215 template <class T>
00216 typename auto_vector<T>::reverse_iterator auto_vector<T>::ToRIter (size_t idx) 
00217 {
00218         ++idx;
00219         return reverse_iterator (ToIter (idx));
00220 }

00223 template <class T>
00224 inline void auto_vector <T>::reserve (size_t count)
00225 {
00226         _arr.reserve (count);
00227 }
00228 
00229 template <class T>
00230 inline void auto_vector<T>::resize (unsigned int newSize)
00231 {
00232         if (newSize < size ())
00233                 std::for_each (ToIter (newSize), end (), DeletePtr<T> ());
00234         _arr.resize (newSize);
00235 }
00236 
00237 template <class T>
00238 void auto_vector<T>::insert (size_t idx, std::auto_ptr<T> p)
00239 {
00240         assert (idx <= size ());
00241         _arr.insert (ToIter (idx), p.get ());
00242         p.release ();
00243 }
